SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.entities.configs

Class BaseEntityConfig

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.entities.configs.BaseEntityConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
CowConfig, EagleConfig, GhostKingConfig, KangarooBossConfig, LionConfig, PlayerConfig, SnakeConfig, TurtleConfig
public class BaseEntityConfig extends Object
Defines a basic set of properties stored in entities config files to be loaded by Entity Factories.
